words.def: mechanical device consisting of a toothed wheel or rack engaged with a pawl that permits it to move in only one direction
a visual display of information
a curved shape in the vertical plane that spans an opening
measuring instrument for indicating speed of rotation
an informal conversation
a charred substance
One of three species of large Asian ungulates belonging to the subfamily Caprinae.
A walled enclosure in Irish antiquity.
United States playwright who collaborated with George S. Kaufman (1904-1961)
a heavy open wagon usually having two wheels and drawn by an animal
headdress that protects the head from bad weather
A person especially a student with a posh accent who looks down on those who are 'common'.
feline mammal usually having thick soft fur and no ability to roar: domestic cats
a motor vehicle with four wheels
electrical conduction through a gas in an applied electric field
a legal document codifying the result of deliberations of a committee or society or legislative body
any of various dark heavy viscid substances obtained as a residue
the products of human creativity
any of various long-tailed rodents similar to but larger than a mouse
An instance of the interjection ah.
(astronomy) the angular distance of a celestial point measured westward along the celestial equator from the zenith crossing
a colorless and odorless inert gas
a hard grey lustrous metallic element that is highly resistant to corrosion
a highly unstable radioactive element (the heaviest of the halogen series)
